title: Vic govt wants Aust-wide hoverboard ban
body:
Typical liberal overreaction. 1 house fire.  "BETTER BAN THEM ALL."

Do you liberals agree with this at all? Can you not see how ridiculous it is?

> Energy Safe Victoria said the unmarked hoverboard, purchased from a NSW distributor, did not comply with national safety standards.

Didn't comply with national safety standards, but this person wants it banned anyways.
